DataElement.preferredName: Neuropathy Previous Fourteen Days Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Yes/No indicator of the presence of a disorder affecting the cranial nerves or the peripheral nervous system in the past 14 days.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The presence of a disorder affecting the cranial nerves or the peripheral nervous system in the past 14 days.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disorder affecting the cranial nerves or the peripheral nervous system.  It is manifested with pain, tingling, numbness, and muscle weakness.  It may be the result of physical injury, toxic substances, viral diseases, diabetes, renal failure, cancer, and drugs. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A disorder affecting the cranial nerves or the peripheral nervous system. It manifests with pain, tingling, numbness, and muscle weakness. It may be the result of physical injury, toxic substances, viral diseases, diabetes, renal failure, cancer, and drugs.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:A natural number greater than 13 and less than 15 and the quantity that it denotes.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 13 and less than 15 and the quantity that it denotes.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: signs that a person has a condition or disease. Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain(NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient have neuropat
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have neuropathy (cranial, motor or sensory) within the last 14 days?
